tasks.task: Installing a sprinkler system in a Texas yard
subtasks: Marking trench locations with spray paint
Digging trenches for pipes, 6-8 inches deep
Preparing trench bottoms and side slopes for pipes
Assembling and laying pipes in trenches
Installing sprinkler heads and adjusting their direction and height
Tamping down soil and restoring sod
Installing and adjusting nozzles for efficient water distribution
Ensuring head-to-head coverage for even watering

tasks.task: Laying pipe for the sprinkler system
subtasks: Cutting Schedule 40 PVC pipe to size
Applying primer and cement to pipe joints
Connecting pipe sections with fittings and couplers
Filling trenches with soil, avoiding hitting the pipes
Compacting backfilled soil with a tamper
Ensuring proper coverage and water distribution
